name: Blind Bag Surprise
description:
Blind Bag Surprise is a fun toy collecting game with all the excitement of a lucky dip!

Blind Bag Surprise is a toy collecting game where you get to unbox as many bling bags as you wish, wherever, whenever you like. No need to travel to your local supermarket or use vending machines to get your blind bags anymore.

what will you find in your lucky bag can you Collect them all!!

5 different Blind Bags including, Superhero figures, emoji key-rings,
Cute animal dolls and block toys.

Blind Bag Surprise is part of the Surprise series including the toy egg surprise games.

Blind Bag Surprise is totally free and is a great game for kids of all ages!
